forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 61F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 64F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 58F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 18C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 18C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 64F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 17C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 20C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 70F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 11C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 52F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
